
# Computop 
![computop](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/computop/logo.png?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `computop` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] Computop 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  Computop (www.computop.com) is a global payment service provider that delivers worldwide compliant and secure e-commerce, Point of Sale (PoS), m-commerce and Mail Order/Telephone Order (MOTO) payment processing. Computop Paygate offers more than 200 payment methods and acquirer connections, state-of-the-art fraud prevention solutions, risk management, tokenization and consolidated reporting. Global customers include C&A,Â Metro Cash & Carry, Samsung and TUI.
